Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add UserManager2 using DocumentManagerSync from SwiftfulDataManagers

Created UserManager2 that inherits from DocumentManagerSync<UserModel> following the same pattern as ProgressManager, StreakManager, and ExperiencePointsManager.

Key features:
- Extends DocumentManagerSync for single document management
- Real-time streaming of user document
- Local persistence with FileManager
- Custom event logging for user-specific actions
- Field-specific update methods (saveUserName, saveUserEmail, etc.)

Dependencies will handle initialization with services, configuration, and logger.

EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive tests for all 4 data manager classes

Created test suites for DocumentManagerSync, DocumentManagerAsync, CollectionManagerSync, and CollectionManagerAsync. Tests cover all public APIs including:

- Initialization with and without cached data
- Document/collection fetching (sync and async)
- Save, update, and delete operations
- Query operations with QueryBuilder
- Error handling for not found scenarios
- logIn/logOut functionality for sync managers

All 58 tests pass successfully. Tests use Mock implementations and properly handle Swift 6 concurrency.

EOF
)")
